content: this 43 round baby blanket can be continued into the larger 86 round mo moe of change pattern this pattern is written for color changing yarn **size ** 41in/104cm **hook ** j/6mm **yarn ** lion brand mandala gnome **yarn weight ** 3/dk/light **yardage ** 1 180yds/1 080m two cakes **stitches and abbreviations used ** bp sl st chain skip single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet single_crochet increase half_double_crochet increase double_crochet increase v-st cluster shell fpdc bpdc fptr bptr sc3tog
